Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: • This is post #7: Music royalty fees could be on the way out – it is what we've all been wanting to hear! The Federal Government has promised to introduce legislation to remove these outdated fees, meaning artists will earn more of what they deserve! Spread the news! #MusicToOurEars #FairPayForArtists #AusMusic @triplej @AUSmusicmonth
